item.title: Chapter 1: This is a Resource-Bundle with two images
item.description:
h1 Heading

h2 Heading

h3 Heading

h4 Heading

h5 Heading
h6 Heading

This is bold text

This is bold text

This is italic text

This is italic text

Deleted text

Heading Another heading
text text
text text
text text

Block quotes are written like so.

They can span multiple paragraphs, if you like.

Some text, and some code and then a nice plain link with title.

And a local link to another chapter

item.title: Chapter 3: Chapter order is default reverse
item.description:
You can use weight (descending) or date (ascending) in frontmatter for sorting the chapters (see order content)
